IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: Focus of Supplemental Report: Initial Report Complainant: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children Attachments: CyberTipline Report # 160159282 Suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Narrative: On May 16, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001, of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region received CyberTipline Report 160159282 from the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children. In CyberTipline Report 160159282 Google reported that a subject uploaded child pornography to the internet on 04-09-2023 at 15:55:40 UTC. I reviewed the reported media and confirmed that it does in-fact depict child pornography and can be described as the following: Filename:cqHSeg_Lh2w.mp4 Description: One video thirteen (13) seconds in length depicting an animated scene with the label 2013 at the bottom. Within the animated scene is a television which is playing a video depicting a human prepubescent male under the age of sixteen (16) (approximately 3 to 5 years of age). The male can be observed fully nude, seated with his legs spread and his penis exposed. The male can be observed turning to the side with his right hand on his buttocks. The animation then changes to what appears to be a movie theater with the label 2023. The movie theater screen depicts a human prepubescent male under the age of sixteen (16) (approximately 3 to 5 years of age) exposing his anus to the camera. Google provided the following information in reference to the suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Google also provided the following URL in reference to the uploaded video: http://youtube.com/watch%3Fv%3DcqHSeg_Lh2w I conducted an open source search of phone number +14438596034 which revealed that it is registered to T-Mobile. I also conducted a search of the above listed IP Address which revealed that it was registered to Comcast Cable Communications. The above listed phone number and IP Address geo-locate to the Salisbury, Wicomico County, Maryland Area. Case open, investigation continuing.

IncidentBusiness.BusinessName: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children

IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeTitle: Google, T-Mobile, and Comcast Subpoena Service
IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: Focus of Supplemental Report: Google, T-Mobile, and Comcast Subpoena Service Complainant: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children Attachments: Google Subpoena T-Mobile Subpoena Comcast Cable Communications Subpoena Suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Narrative: On May 17, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region authored the following subpoenas which were reviewed and signed by the Wicomico County States Attorneys Office: Google Requesting Google subscriber information for the following accounts (Names, Addresses, Phone Numbers, and any information) pmonique308@gmail.com Date: 04-10-2023 at 13:39:45 UTC This subpoena was served on Google LLC on May 17, 2023, at 1258 hours [12:58 p.m.] via Googles online law enforcement portal LERS. T-Mobile Requesting subscriber information / records to include full name(s), addresses (billing and physical), associated telephone numbers, email addresses, etc. associated with the following phone numbers: +14438596034 utilized on 04-10-2023 at 13:39:45 UTC +15614025733 utilized on 04-10-2023 at 13:39:45 UTC This subpoena was served on T-Mobile on May 17, 2023, at 1311 hours [1:11 p.m.] via email to lerinbound@t-mobile.com. Comcast Cable Communications Requesting subscriber information / records to include full name(s), addresses (billing and physical), associated telephone numbers, email addresses, etc. associated with the following IP addresses: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f utilized on 04-10-2023 at 03:22:00 UTC and 04-09-2023 at 03:15:20 UTC This subpoena was served on Comcast Cable Communications on May 17, 2023, at 1309 hours [1:09 p.m.] via Comcasts online law enforcement portal. Case open, investigation continuing.

Focus of Supplemental Report: Comcast Subpoena Response Complainant: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children Attachments: Final Response LCR782293 Final Certification LCR782293 Suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Narrative: On May 25, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region received a response from Comcast Cable Communications in reference to the records subpoena which was served on May 17, 2023. Comcast Cable Communications provided me with the following information in reference to IP Address2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f assigned on 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC and 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC: Subscriber Name: WENDY VILLANOIX Service Address: 1710 EMERSON AVE, SALISBURY, MD 218013223 Billing Address: 1710 EMERSON AVE, SALISBURY, MD 218013223 Telephone #: (410) 422-9126 Type of Service: Internet Account Number: 8299410010623142 Account Status: Active IP Assignment: Dynamically Assigned E-mail User Ids: Wendyvillanoix Caseopen, investigation continuing.

Focus of Supplemental Report: Google Subpoena Response Complainant: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children Attachments: BillingInfo_895226601648 pmonique308.SubscriberInfo Letter 35121633 Suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Narrative: On May 24, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region received a response from Google in reference to the records subpoena served on May 17, 2023. Google provided me with the following information in reference to the email address pmonique308@gmail.com: Google Account ID: 289796134382 Name: Monique Paul Given Name: Monique Family Name: Paul e-Mail: pmonique308@gmail.com Alternate e-Mails: Created on: 2020-09-14 21:36:18 Z Terms of Service IP: 2601:153:880:92a0:dcfd:98ca:72e8:8767 Services: Gmail, Web App Activity, Google Calendar, Location History, YouTube, Android, Google My Maps, Google Payments, Play Loyalty, Tasks In Tingle Deletion IP: End of Service Date: 2023-04-10 13:39:39 Z Last Updated Date: 2023-04-11 19:46:06 Z Last Logins: ACCOUNT RECOVERY Recovery e-Mail: Recovery SMS: +14438596034 [US] PHONE NUMBERS 2-Step Verification Phone Numbers: IP ACTIVITY No User IP Logs Name: Monique Paul Customer Type: INDIVIDUAL Entity ID: 4611686023459251081 Customer Number: 8952-2660-1648 Customer Instruments Added on: 2021-10-17 01:45:33 UTC Deleted on: N/A Billing Name: N/A Instrument Description: Google Play balance: $0.00 Added on: 2023-03-04 05:03:04 UTC Deleted on: N/A Billing Name: Monique Paul Instrument Description: Visa6675 Instrument Type: Credit Card Card Number: 4403934741426675 Expiration Date: 1/2028 Card Product Name: N/A Card Scheme: CARD_SCHEME_VISA Card Class: CARD_CLASS_DEBIT Prepaid: true Corporate: N/A Country of Issue: USA Added on: 2023-04-05 22:44:44 UTC Deleted on: N/A Billing Name: N/A Instrument Description: Visa9532 Instrument Type: Credit Card Card Number: 4946380013089532 Expiration Date: 9/2026 Card Product Name: N/A Card Scheme: CARD_SCHEME_VISA Card Class: CARD_CLASS_CREDIT Prepaid: N/A Corporate: N/A Country of Issue: USA Cloud Primary Account Number: 4642639655547322 Case open, investigation continuing.

IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeTitle: Wicomico County Board of Education Check
IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: Focus of Supplemental Report: Wicomico County Board of Education Check Complainant: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children Attachments: Wicomico County Board of Education Student Profile Claire Anna Villanoix Wicomico County Board of Education Student ProfileDave Stanley Paulifond Wicomico County Board of Education Student Profile Marie Rodeline Bien-Aime Wicomico County Board of Education Student ProfileKarl Erinelson Bein-Aime Suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Narrative: On June 14, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region contacted the Wicomico Count Board of Education in reference to any students / children residing at 1710 Emerson Avenue, Salisbury, Maryland 21801. The Wicomico County Board of Education provided me with the following student information: Claire Anna Villanoix DOB 04/03/2016 Race: Black / Sex: Female Mother: Monique Paul 443-859-6034 Father: Wendy Villanoix 410-422-9126 Dave Stanley Paulifond DOB: 06/09/2007 Race: Black / Sex: Male Mother: Monique Paul 443-859-6034 Marie Rodeline Bien-Aime DOB: 06/30/2010 Race: Black / Sex: Female Mother: Magnela Paul 443-523-7071 Karl Erinelson Bein-Aime DOB: 03/22/2005 Race: Black / Sex: Male Mother: Magnela Paul 443-523-7071 Case open, investigation continuing.

Focus of Supplemental Report: Contact at 1710 Emerson Avenue Complainant: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children Suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Narrative: On July 14, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region responded to 1710 Emerson Avenue, Salisbury, Wicomico County, Maryland. I made contact with DaveStanley Paulifond [hereinafter referred to as Dave]. Dave identified Monique Paul as his mother however informed me that she was at work. Dave provided the following contact information for his mother: Name: Moinque Paul Phone: 443-859-6034 Case open, investigation continuing.

Focus of Supplemental Report: Attempt to Contact Monique Paul Complainant: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children Suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Narrative: On August 17, 2023, at approximately 0938 hours [9:38 a.m.] I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region attempted to contact Monique Paul via telephone at 443-859-6034. I was met with a voice mailbox for Monique Paul in which I left a message. Additional attempts to contact Monique Paul will be forthcoming. Case open, investigation continuing.

Focus of Supplemental Report: Knock and Talk / Case Disposition Complainant: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children Suspect: Name: Monique Paul Mobile Phone: +14438596034 (Verified 07-10-2021 03:38:33 UTC) Mobile Phone: +15614025733 (Verified 11-02-2022 02:20:13 UTC) Date of Birth: 06-07-1976 Email Address: pmonique308@gmail.com (Verified) IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-10-2023 03:22:00 UTC IP Address: 2601:153:880:92a0:6153:eaaf:8196:722f (Login) 04-09-2023 03:15:20 UTC Evidence: One (1) body worn camera video of contact with Monique Paul, stored athttps://mdsp.evidence.com/axon/evidence?evidence_id=78fb4d544b8a431e9de9e18b80c03d8dpartner_id=5ed6a168304e40eb9a0cfb1a226ef1a1 Narrative: On September 13, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region made contact with Monique Paul [hereinafter referred to as Monique] at 1710 Emerson Avenue, Salisbury, Wicomico County, Maryland. While contacting Monique, it was learned that she is not fluent in the English Language. I communicated with Monique utilizing a Haitian Creole interpreter from Language Line Solutions #419333. While speaking with Monique, I learned that she has three children who reside at the residence. Monique said her children are 16 years of age, 7 years of age, and 4 years of age. Monique identified her 4-year-old who matches the description from the reported video of approximately 3 to 5 years of age as Wendersky Villanoix. Monique said she has a YouTube account and identified the above listed account as hers. Monique also said that her son Wendersky often accesses YouTube utilizing her account. An internet safety talk was conducted with Monique during which the laws pertaining to child pornography and concepts of monitoring what her children are doing on the internet to promote a safe and healthy internet experience for her children were relayed to her. Administrative Closure / Police Information
